page.title: 05THE RIVER OG
page.content: This survey of the{River Og}was carried out at Bay Bridges near Ogbourne Maizey.At this point the river is 36.75cm deep and 8m wide.On the day of the survey the temperature of the river was 15 degrees.The pH value of the river was 7 showing that it is reasonably clean.The river was flowing at a speed of 0.23Km an hour. The Og is a very clear river.There are many{animals}living in it _ we found shrimps,snails and leeches, and saw some fish.We found these animals by using nets and jars,and looking under weeds and stones. There are many types of{plants}in the river.The most commom is canadian pond weed,though there are also a lot of reeds and some water cress. Animals like shrimps use the pond to shelter from fish.
